divs: Sighting DetailsI was in bed asleep when this accured.I was awakened but ethier could not or would not open my eyes.I know there was two of them,one at my feet and one at my head but did not feelany hands.I felt that i knew what was happening but when i sensed the light onmy face,i kicked away and awoke in my bed.I knew it was not a dream because icould sense moving from one room to another,plus i heard the door open and thatswhen i felt the light on me,it has not been the last time this has accured.I didask my neighbors if they had seen anything at that time but they had not and theman who lives across the way did not ethier,so if this had been someone brakingin he would have seen them since he is awake during that time and our dog wouldhave barked if it had been a human intruder and she did not.
